property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {REVOLUTION CHANGE} Fire or Nature Dragon - (When one of your Fire or Nature Dragons attacks, you may switch that creature with this creature from your hand.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, turn Dogiragon Gacha 3 times. Each time you do, use that ability.

property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Reveal the top card of your deck then choose one of the following: ► Put that card into your mana zone: ► Choose one your opponent's creatures that costs less than the revealed card and put it into its owner's mana zone.

(A creature that has "speed attacker" doesn't get summoning sickness.)

property.value: Mega Command Dragon/Revolutionary/Team Hamukatsu

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Revolution Change: Fire or Nature dragon that costs 5 or more {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, choose one of your opponent's creatures and put it into its owner's mana zone. Then choose one of your opponent's forbidden creatures and destroy it. ■ Final Final Revolution: When you put this creature, if you haven't used another "Final Revolution" in this game, your opponent's creatures that have power 1000000 or less can't attack you next turn.
